Name: Mireille and Amrita, the Forest of Illusions
About the game: All characters in this game are 18 or older. [Story] Mireille was a nun living in a small village in the mountains. One day, her sick father's illness takes a turn for the worse. To find the materials needed to cure his illness, the girl goes out on an adventure. [Character] Mireille Main character, nun from Holst village. Abandoned as a child and raised by the priest of the church. A kind and caring girl working as a nun. [Game system] Adventure RPG 'Everyone's favorite, a classic RPG!' Turn-based front view format 'Easy to learn combat system!' Finishing moves ' 'M boost', used when TP reaches 100, can increase status significantly!' Status 'Bad status' available, which will affect the outcome of the fight!'
